page.title: 15Clubs
page.content: Although,for the reasons already given (p.4), there is very little social life at Lindean,the communal organisations that do exist are well supported. The local W.R.I.and a carpet bowling club have both existed for more than 50 years,each with an average membership of between 25 and 40,and an evening continuation class in painting,now in its third year,attracts its maximum number of enrolments(20).Their meeting place is the public hall (p.14), where occasional entertainments-dances, folk music concerts, whist drives-and fund raising events are also held. It is also the venue of the children's Christmas party organised by the W.R.I.
